name: ITP - B1004B - WPB Slip - Reinforced Slope - Soil Nails
template name: ITP - B1004B - WPB Slip - Reinforced Slope - Soil Nails

name: Detail - Before setout of the reinforced slope method all vegetation and debris clearance within the limits of the site is to be completed
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - In accordance with TNZ F/1
Detail - Any excavation and filling required is to be carried out. Excavation should be kept to a minimum
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - In accordance with TNZ F/1.
Detail - Material to meet specifications dependant on material type selected
Frequency - Source test of each material used (minimum 10 rocks per source)
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - 1. Schmidt Hammer test (minimum of 10 rocks per source) and 90% result ≥ 50 in all direction or
2. Weathering resistance AA,AB, BB or CA (NZS4407)
3. Specific of gravity ≥ 2.56 or up size rock to compensate
4. maximum dimension of any rock ≤ 3 times narrowest dimension
Detail - Consistency though construction and clean of dirt
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Monitor on site
Conformance Criteria - Visual inspection for consistency of rock from the source should be undertaken throughout works, if variation is noted additional testing should be undertaken
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Supplier certification and delivery dockets
Conformance Criteria - Prior to megaflow installation
Records - Collect all delivery dockets and photos
Detail - Rock Bolt & Soil Nail materials to be ordered in accordance with the specification & design drawings
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
○ Lengths and diameters shown on drawings are the minimum required

– Name, qualification and experience of concrete works inspector

Detail - Reinforcing steel manufacturers test reports and certificates

Detail - Submit all concrete mix designs, trial mixes and compliance records
Frequency - Three weeks prior to pouring concrete

Conformance Criteria - Mix Design to be approved by CPS Engineer before commencing construction
Detail - Test to be carried out on Grout mix before it is ordered for construction

Conformance Criteria - Mix design to be approved by CPS Engineer three weeks before commencing construction
Records - Test results to CONQA Procore
Detail - Grout checked if its free from lumps & segregation
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - Request for use of alternative Drilling Fluid (Section 7.5.2)
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Detail - Arrange for a set out survey to be carried out & check against design drawings including sacrificial nails
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Conformance Criteria - Consistency with Construction Drawing
Detail - Soil Nail construction methodology plan must be submitted two weeks prior to works starting
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Conformance Criteria - Include sprayed concrete, grouting and tremie concrete in methodology
Detail - Drill hole, install Bolt/Nail, install Grout. Location for Sacrificial Soil Nails to be agreed on Site with CPS Engineer.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection/ Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Bore logs of Drilling, installation record
Detail - Test after a 7 day period. Load up to the specified requirements with the CPS Engineer overseeing proceedings
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection/ Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Design Team to approve grout test result prior to sacrificial testing being commenced.
○ CPS Engineer to observe testing and provide feedback.

Detail - The construction team shall stage the excavation of the retained face such that the excavation proceeds no more than 1m below the current level of soil nails being installed or vertical spacing of the soil nails plus the required reinforcing lap or the short term stand up height of the ground, whichever is less. The construction team shall protect the face of the excavation from damage at all times.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measure
Detail - Location of all Test Nails to be agree on site (Section 7.8.1)
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection

Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
○ Drill log to be submitted to CPS Engineer including the depth at which water was encountered if there was any.
○ Submit all installation records for each soil nail and pile.
Detail - Flush all soil nail holes with water and air after drilling to remove smear and drilling debris
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - Insert soil nails as specified
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Soil nails must be inserted into the drill hole to the required length without difficulty to prevent damage
Detail - A record is to be maintained showing the type and installation date for each soil nail
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Conformance Criteria - Installation records shall include:
– Batch numbers associated with grout placed in each hole
Detail - Install Grout. Install Grout on the same day of drilling unless otherwise approved by Designer
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
○ Must notify CPS for any failed result and cease works until resolved
Records - Subcontractor QA Records and Photos
Detail - Grout samples shall be taken from each batch and tested by an approved laboratory. Flow cone tests shall be undertaken for each batch
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Testing
Conformance Criteria - Must reach specified minimum 7-day and 28-day compressive strengths
Detail - Loss of grout shall be monitored and recorded for each hole during and immediately after grouting
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measure
Conformance Criteria - All materials delivery dockets to be collected to ensure that corrosion protection materials has been delivered & installed.
3.15 - Testing of Soil Nails - Each Row
Detail - All testing equipment must have been calibrated by an IANZ registered laboratory (or approved equivalent) within the last three months and shall be certified
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Conformance Criteria - Certifications of all testing equipment within the last 3 months
3.16 - Testing of Soil Nails - Minimum Resting Period Before Testing
Detail - Leave nails in an undisturbed condition until the specified 7-day grout strengths have been achieved

Detail - Test soil nails in accordance to design specs (Section 7.6.1 and 7.6.2)

Conformance Criteria - Load testing 10% of working soil nails - CPS Engineer to witness testing & give approval to carryon with next lift of Bolts/Nails
Records - Test results to CONQA Procore
3.18 - Final Inspection Before Next Row Commencement
Detail - Final inspection of CPS Engineer to give approval to remove bench and start on next rows of Bolts/Nails

Conformance Criteria - CPS Engineer to give approval via a NTC
Detail - Install subsoil drainage as required in accordance with specification
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - As per drawing 1.5m alternate with weep holes
Detail - Prepare shotcrete surface - Soil surface is to remain stable and in profile required until the shotcrete is applied and hardened

Detail - No concrete shall be placed until the CPS Engineer has had the opportunity to ensure the drawings and specification have been complied with . 48 Hours notice required.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Compliance with Drawings and Specification
Detail - Apply shotcrete - 200mm Nominal thick (Vertical). Apply shotcrete - minimum 150mm thick and nominal 175mm (Horizontal)
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - Compression Testing - Coring > 20 hours after placing - 75mm minimum dimension of the cores

3.24 - Final Inspection - Each Shotcrete Soil Nails Row
Detail - Final surface inspection - Shotcrete shall be cured for a minimum period of seven days with no cracks greater than 0.3m

Conformance Criteria - Surface Inspected by CPS Engineer & Approval given to carry on with works
